page.title: 13EMPLOYMENT 2
page.content: BARNTON AND LITTLE LEIGH 03600375 Our part time workers spend between 10 and 25 hours a week at work with the most common being 18 hours.Their paid holiday entitlement varies between nil and 35 days according to employer rather than hours worked. The standard full time working week is 37.5 hours. 30% work over 40 hours with one individual claiming 65 hours. The three professional educators spend 27.5 hours working with pupils and a further 20 hours approximately in preparation and marking. Holiday entitlement varies with employer and status of job. No Bank or Public holidays are included in the follwing figures except for our educators. Only one individual has a bare 10 days, 35% have 15-20days, 40% have 20-25 days, 20% have over 25 days and 5% (teachers) have 65 days.
